Reviews.Title: Liked the 1st one so much I am keeping the second one now.
Reviews.Author: Robert Bruss
Reviews.Content: I accidental ordered two of these cameras. I was going to return one of them until I used the first on. I am so impressed with this camera, both from ease of use and getting up and running to the quality of the pictures and videos. Then it has an infrared flash that makes it an idea night surveillance camera. I may get more in the future as the need arises. No disappointments here. It does everything the manufacture says it does..

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to do. Clear photos and videos. Adequate setup options
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: It takes decent photos and videos within the roughly 10 - 15 foot range of it's IR at night.  Daylight is of course fine at any distance.  There's really only one problem I had for MY use (may not be an issue for you).  I was trying to see what my cat was doing in a particular spot.  Due to the delay between the camera sensing motion and actually taking the video the cat (or whatever triggered it, who knows) was no longer in the frame.  I think it's a half second delay. I noted in one of the other reviews that they said it ate up batteries.  I have not noticed that in the time I've used mine, a couple weeks.  I only use Duracell because I've found cheap batteries, like CostCo's Kirkland brand or the crazy ones you get with imported stuff, simply don't last very long.

Reviews.Title: Ever wonder what's in you back yard?
Reviews.Author: golf2000
Reviews.Content: First night.....2 skunks, 1 opossum, I fox.  We were very surprised because we had never seen any of these in our subdivision.  Camera takes pretty good pictures at night.  Very good pictures in day.  Cannot compare against more expensive cameras because I've never seen their results.....but for the cost of this one, my wife and I both have enjoyed seeing what moves through our yard at night.

Reviews.Title: Simmons Whitetail trail camera
Reviews.Author: Hamer95USA
Reviews.Content: The camera works great as expected. Be sure to calibrate the date/time and the camera functions so it will take your pictures as expected. You will also want to buy AA lithium batteries as it will eat up the AA akaline batteries very quickly.

Reviews.Title: Easy, works well
Reviews.Author: A. Lawler
Reviews.Content: No need for a long fancy review here. This is a very simple camera, setup is quick and painless and works very well. It does everything I need, nothing that I don't, and at a very good price. If I were to be buying another camera, I would buy this same one again, and I gladly recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: So Far, it is pretty great.
Reviews.Author: Mama T "audreyk"
Reviews.Content: I'm in the Poconos and I have a parade of wildlife through my yard.  I bought a couple of low end trail cams three years ago that were on closeout and they worked pretty well.  They're a cool concept in and of themselves, but the other two drained batteries at an alarming rate devouring C batteries 4 at a time in a matter of a week.  This little guy, about the size of a paperback book, uses cheaper AA batteries and uses them very gently.  If I find a flaw, I'll update my review but so far I'm thinking about buying a couple more for security purposes.  Price is right and I'll be able to speak about durability at the end of the summer.  So far, I'm in love.

Reviews.Title: Its works okay if the batteries stay in place
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: I bought this to track critter traffic thru our backyard. It took great pictures of me going to get it after a night of watching our deer , fox and other friends but very few pics of these animals showed up because the batteries decided to pop out of the holder.At first I thought it was from me placing the camera on fence posts or whatever to catch a glimpse of wildlife that I know traverses through our yard at night but its not OE. Daytime pics were good of our dogs running the yard or me walking the yard but I only got 4 pics of deer.Read the instructions and followed the details but it still does not capture decent pics as the batteries seem to just fall out.Good experiment for one the many game cameras out there. Wouldn't buy another

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Paul Thibodaux
Reviews.Content: We bought this to photo our feral cat house to see what was eating the food.  The cats (3) escaped the enclosure on day 10 of a 28 day enclosure period and we thoght they were gone.  1st day 112 pictures of at least two cats returning at night.  I want to move it to the woods and see what really goes on there.  Easy to use, set up software and move to another location.

Reviews.Title: Great Start
Reviews.Author: Donald Kreuser
Reviews.Content: Set-up for this trail cam was very easy.  Directions were clear and accurate.  I set the cam 20 yards from my tree stand and came back in two weeks to see if I had activity. The cam recorded 127 pictures, 90% of those pictures were deer.  Daylight pictures and early evening pictures were excellent. After dark the flash did not extend beyond about 10 yards. I am considering purchasing another Simmons.

Reviews.Title: Wished I had bought different
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera was not what I was lead to believe it would be from the reviews I had read on Amazon.  Definitely not worth the money in comparison to other cameras of slightly greater price.  Two prominent problems.  One, the motion sensor is way to sensitive, in fact, it is so sensitive it takes most of its pictures, especially after dark, when there is no movement at all.  Consequently you get hundreds of pictures that have nothing in them.  I usually get anywhere from six hundred to a thousand empty pictures within a 24 hr. period.  For some reason during the daylight it is a lot less sensitive.  Secondly, it uses batteries up fast, which is caused, of course, by the frequent picture taking.  This camera is OK if you can get to it everyday, and have lots of cheap batteries.  The pictures quality is plenty good enough within the stated range.  I would not purchase again.

Reviews.Title: simmons whitetail trail camera
Reviews.Author: herschel e davis
Reviews.Content: don't take picture at night very good  that what I got it for. it ok for day . thank you .

Reviews.Title: Works awesome!
Reviews.Author: Bitwave
Reviews.Content: Not a lot of bells and whistle, simple to setup and use, picture quality is clear and it was under 100 bucks!  Night mode works great no bright flashes so it works well as a security cam around the camp too which is what I bought it for mainly. I would buy another one of these.

Reviews.Title: works, but not thebest
Reviews.Author: dlupchurch21
Reviews.Content: does its job, does not take great night time photos. Bought a bushnell on sale that I like much more

Reviews.Title: Great Daylight Camera...Bad Night Camera
Reviews.Author: Elva in Texas
Reviews.Content: The pictures of movement during the day are  sharp, but the night movement pictures just reflect the glow of the eyes of the predators.  Everything else is black.  The glowing eyes could be anything from a racoon to a wild hog.  No clue from the images we get from this camera.

Reviews.Title: There are probably better ones to be had!
Reviews.Author: JGP
Reviews.Content: It didn't have the range we needed so we returned it. It wasn't easy to set up. The 16 GB memory card didn't work in it. Perhaps our card was defective but a lower GB card did work.

Reviews.Title: Probably not
Reviews.Author: steven pettingill
Reviews.Content: Does not work well as a night vision camera. Daylight images are a little fuzzy also. Some images just appear as shadows.

Reviews.Title: This camera is not that good...
Reviews.Author: Justin Rainey "Buck Rainey"
Reviews.Content: Maybe my camera is defective, but it does not take good quality photos.  I can see if you have never owned a game camera that you may like this one... but I own many, and this one takes poor quality photos.  It WILL take a picture and work properly so you do get what you pay for (the reason I gave it 3 stars).  But no matter what setting I put the camera on, the photos are so far from the quality I get from my other cameras.  Even the plastic and general construction seem weak.  But with all that said, it does function as it should.

Reviews.Title: poor motion-detection and range
Reviews.Author: P. Ha
Reviews.Content: Got this camera because it had good reviews.Well this is piece of junk: had to return it. Maybe mine was defective.Got this to capture front lawn animals making mess.The motion-detection was unreliable, it does not trigger motion as advertised.I had to put my hand inches away for it to take photos.Would not recommend this trail cam.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dorothy E. Kreuter "Videographer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to see what was walking around in my backyard.  Works well.  I like that it can be secured by a lock so it can't be stolen nor opened.  I use a small Master lock on it to keep someone from stealing the memory card.  I use a gun lock to secure the camera to a post, pole or tree to keep someone from stealing the whole camera.  Photos and video are clear.

Reviews.Title: Has some limitations
Reviews.Author: Dfalk "Deba"
Reviews.Content: The day pictures are nice, night are iffy.  Does notpick up everything within the range it states.  I selectmultiple pics and it rarely will take a picture when animals are sitting in front of the camera. I get nice hind shots when they leave the range!  Night shots are black and white which I don'tmind but Primos takes very nice night photos and that comparison makes Simmons look crappy.Primos is an excellent trail cam but eventually within 1.5 years, starts eating battery life.  Cold weatheras well.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat pleased
Reviews.Author: slmvick
Reviews.Content: Pictures are good and are taken at correct rate but the camera does not keep date or time accurately - dates are 3 and 4 days ahead of actual time

Reviews.Title: Decent trail camera
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Wilkes
Reviews.Content: The daytime pics of the neighborhood cats and birds are excellent, unfortunately I bought it to capture some fo the night time visitors, namely deer. The first place I installed the camera was a little too far away and pictures were not to good. I moved it in to about 15 feet and they were better. I then set a post within 10 feet and the pictures were very good. The camera is easy to program, the batteries ( Duracell ) are long lasting, 300 pictuers so far in very cold temps. I guess I should give it 4.5 stars. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Jason Hudson
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for in most cases.  I have found this camera takes great day time photographs and below average night time photos.  Set up is simple but i would have rather spent another 20$ and got something better.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the money
Reviews.Author: Happy Booker "Annie One"
Reviews.Content: Ok camera for the price.  The delay from subject tripping the shot to the camera taking the picture seems a bit long.  Still don't know what is digging up the back yard.  But some great shots during the daylight of the dog running around.

Reviews.Title: It's OK!?
Reviews.Author: Donny Thompson
Reviews.Content: It doesn't take very good picture at night. It needs to illuminate more to give you a better picture. Other than that it is fairly easy to program and use.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Kevin Henebry
Reviews.Content: I've used this camera for about 6 weeks, and find it to be just as described. It takes wonderful pictures despite conditions - day or night, rainy or clear, close-up or distant. I've gotten shots of deer from spotted fawn to 7 point buck. It has enabled me to select two very good sites to place my ladder stands.The only complaint I have about it is that it records the time of the picture on a 24 hour clock, but it is impossible to set the time on a 24 hour clock. When I'm selecting the hour setting it goes from 1 to 12 then back to 1 again. every one of my pictures if 12 hours off.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Kb
Reviews.Content: GOOD THINGS The camera is small, has a good battery life, takes good pics in the day and ok ones at night.NOT SO GOOD  the night time pics are not very good and the night range pic in short.  The trigger time is a little slowOver all I would buy again because of the price. I wish the pics at night were better, but lets face it I hunt deer in the day and the night pics are not that important.Takes 4 AA bats  that last a long time  a lot cheaper to operate than mostHope this helps

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Sean Fortney
Reviews.Content: Camera works good so far.  Battery life has been very good.  Size of the camera allows for good concealment.  Price was very good.  Only problem I have had so far is that the pictures are a little grainy.  Night pics are better than the day pics.  Overall a good camera and I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: feild camera
Reviews.Author: nanette robison
Reviews.Content: I  bought this as a gift for my dad. He absolutely loves it. Easy to use easy to install. Great images. He has used it to see what types of animals are prowling about so far he as captured  an owl and several deer. Camera does what it claims. Works great. Highly recommend it to anyone wanting to capture some great pictures of widelife.

Reviews.Title: Good day time pics
Reviews.Author: Paul Brescia
Reviews.Content: I takes great pictures in day time, but the night vision is not very good, the battery life is what I bought them for, the 4 double A batteries do last longer then the other cameras I have that have larger and more expensive batteries.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: M. K. Kellar
Reviews.Content: Bought this to monitor my fifth wheel camper that I leave at campground and so far works good. High quality pics but will eat batteries!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: W. A. Merrick "WAM"
Reviews.Content: The Simmons Whitetail Trail Camera was amazing! Easy to set up, great pictures of humming birds on the feeder that would be difficult to take any other way. It worked so well I ordered another for a different location.

Reviews.Title: Got the job done.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The setup and operation took several tries to get everything right. I still can't get the usb port to connect to my computer so I have to open it up and remove the SD card to download the pics. Since you have to open the camera to turn it on or off it is no big deal but something I haven't figured out yet.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: It did the job showing pictures of the deer night or day as well as the time it was there. Good for planning a hunt.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought this
Reviews.Author: Catlady76
Reviews.Content: Helped us in identifying and eliminating our skunk problem.  Very easy to set up and use which is especially good for me as I am not a tech savy person.  My husband was very glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Interesting Camera
Reviews.Author: NauticalArt
Reviews.Content: This is my first Trail Camera. I bought it to confirm that a Gray Fox was visiting my yard during the night, and this camera has confirmed that suspicion with several photos of the Fox. The camera takes fairly nice color photos during the day, but don't expect high definition or color in the nighttime photos. However, it will tell you what is roaming the wilds of your backyard.

Reviews.Title: Good and bad
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera a few days ago, saw it had mix reviews but for the price what can you say? It works very we'll in day time but night time not so well even when I put the camera not five feet from bait block you still can only see shapes. And one other down fall of it is that it doesn't show how many pictures it took, you have to upload them all. I like how small it is and the fact it uses 4 AAs. I'm happy with it and I'd get one more. It's cheap and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Magical Moments!
Reviews.Author: Robert Trout
Reviews.Content: Great for capturing wildlife.  Did not expect to see the things I did.  Pictures were clear, videos were very good and night vision was very good.  Would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Pay For
Reviews.Author: Anthony Combs
Reviews.Content: Not the greatest picture quality, but it does the job.  Night vision is limited on range, but not unreasonable.  Unlike others, I am getting good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Munroe
Reviews.Content: Was very happy with this product and the price.The camera meets all my needs and more with very good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Johns
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Comes with strap to mount to tree, etc. takes great pics. Ready for the big buck to appear now

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and I didn't even know it had a video setting got a doe and two fawns coming in right now easy to use absolutely love it

Reviews.Title: NOT WORKING!
Reviews.Author: Simona Petrick
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wanted to return this product ALMOST immediately after I got it, gave it another try and went past my 30 day return.  How long have I had this 2/3 months?  It doesn't work at all....I have tried 3 different SD cards and they are all empty.  I have checked all the settings multiple times.  I am TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED with Simmons and AMAZON.!  the SD card I bought keeps flashing with errors as well, and I am unable to reformat it....RUN THE OTHER WAY.  In fact GO TO A STORE, do NOT even buy here, I'm still waiting on something I bought 12/25....VERY DISILLUSIONED WITH AMAZON!  thank you for nothing!  Piece  of CRAP!  80 bux for nothing!

Reviews.Title: Needs some redesigning
Reviews.Author: Greg Rakel
Reviews.Content: This camera is way to sensitive. Hundreds of pictures of nothing caused by wind, falling leaves, rain and snow. Night flash is extremely weak and night pictures seem very low in quality. Day pictures are excellent. I would not buy another.

Reviews.Title: Ravingly good
Reviews.Author: Gerald S. Bringle
Reviews.Content: Adjacent to the night life, this little camera takes nice pictures.All the little wild night animals search me out.

Reviews.Title: trail camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great little camera. Easy to operate. Takes great clear photos. There is nothing more I can say about it. Great camera for the price

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: jim schultz
Reviews.Content: Works ok very simple to use. Use a micro sd card and adapter so you can view pics on your phone without a computer

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Rochelle L Kunkelmann
Reviews.Content: This is the best ever. Bought a different one to try and compair to this one.  THIS ONE BEAT IT HANDS Down SO SENT other one back and ordered a second one of these

Reviews.Title: Simmons nught vision
Reviews.Author: Slownamd12
Reviews.Content: It's performing beyond my expectations. Love the compact size. I'm definitely going to purchase more for the property. Was wondering what was eating my plants, not anymore. Got an up close look at the bear and deer at night. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Smaller than expected, but that is not a bad thing.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Larson
Reviews.Content: This little camera is quite small. I have several other similar type cameras, but this one is just as good at half the size and half the price. I have great pictures of critters large and small and it was easy to set the camera up and view photos.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Randy Nispel
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the money. It has most of the options of more expensive ones. Economical battery use since it uses just 4 AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE: Defective Products from DEPENDABLE RESOURCE. No Remedy.
Reviews.Author: jonathan char
Reviews.Content: Management fails to acknowledge defects. YOU WILL BE STUCK WITH DEPENDABLE RESOURCE PRODUCT AND DEFECTS. I wish I never bought from Dependable Resource. DO NOT BUY. VERY TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE with Dependable Resource DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS go without acknowledgement.

Reviews.Title: Great trail cam!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Takes great pics night or day.  Best camera ever on battery use/life.  So small and light.  This performs so great that I bought two more.  Fits right in your jacket pocket.  Super easy to transport in the woods.  Ideal for me taking on long hikes back in the woods where I hunt.  No problems whatsoever.  Sensitivity is perfect versus other cameras that take way to many "ghost" pics on windy days.  Highly recommend this little guy!

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: John in NC
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is pretty good in the daytime, so-so at night (b&w; lower rez).  User manual is ok, still not sure what the FO and SO options are on the 'Format' step?  Also, this is not a wide angle lens, so must learn the field of view from initial test shots since there's no easy way to monitor the aim without puling the card from the unit and reviewing on PC.  8Gb card holds LOTS of photos, so should be plenty. Got this in lieu of more expensive security cameras to see what was going on around the house at all hours.  If a lot of action, I'd invest in real security cameras, if not, then this would be useful 'spot' camera in the yard.

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Anderson
Reviews.Content: It is so exciting to retrieve the pix from the camera and see the wildlife that is wandering in the back of my cottage while I am totally unaware.

Reviews.Title: Works reliably. Detects squirrels but not birds
Reviews.Author: M. Dionne
Reviews.Content: I first bought a different brand from Amazon and it was dead on arrival. So I carefully read the reviews for the competing models, and many had multiple reviews for complete failures. This one did not seem to have many problems. After a month it is still working.At 6 feet, it detects squirrels but does not sense birds as large as a dove, so don't count on it to work at your bird feeder.

Reviews.Title: Great pics
Reviews.Author: Nadine Parker
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to take pics of animals in yard. Easy set up. Works as described. Day photo's color good. Night b/w expected quality. Great product for a great price.

Reviews.Title: SEE BELOW
Reviews.Author: Shirley Langlois
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a gift. I did not personally use it but it appeared the best available for the price. O>K>

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Rininger
Reviews.Content: I've used this one to monitor my driveway, scout for deer, and see what was getting into my shed and eating my chicken feed.  Nice features for the money.  I'd buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Night Camera
Reviews.Author: Merrill Krieger
Reviews.Content: It does not cover the range I was expecting. I'm still experminting with different angles. This could improve viewing. I don't check camera often.

Reviews.Title: WORKS NICE
Reviews.Author: Michael Kopp
Reviews.Content: FOR THE MONEY I CANT COMPLAIN, TAKES GOOD CLEAR PICTURES AT A PRICE THAT DID NOT BREAK THE BANK . AND EASE TO USE.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for Spying on Wildlife and Feral Cats
Reviews.Author: Gloria Collie
Reviews.Content: Great camera did just what I wanted it to do.  I used it to take pics of what goes on in the dark at my feral cat feeding station.  Saw the raccoons eating the cat food and also the cat getting a snack of food as well.  Now I know who and what is eating the food.  A fun camera!  Also, my regular camera wasn't working and I wanted to take a pic of myself, so I used the Trail camera and it turned out pretty good!  I will be tracking more animals with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Simmons Whitetail Trail Camera with Night Vision (4MP)
Reviews.Author: Rebecca M. Grant "R.M. Grant"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product for my husband for his birthday and although we have not seen any REAL wildlife on our farm (unfortunately the deer have been completely hunted out, we used to have a herd of about 20 deer) we have amazing pictures of our dogs having a ball running around by the tree we mounted the cam in.  It takes absolutely gorgeous pics of trees, sky, dogs (us of course) walking the trails on the farm by our stream running at the back of the property.  Overall, this is an amazing product.  My husband is very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice , slower price unit that will operate 6 months with a set of lithium batteries
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: Nice low price unit that seems to work ok. It worked for 6 months on one set of lithium batteries without a change.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Joe Marietta
Reviews.Content: For the price it's a good camera. I had the same issue of the time being off twelve hours. Also, the range is a little short, only about 25ft so that might be it's biggest limitation in my opinion. Also, the flash is not truly infared and is visible (both during the day and at night) which the deer will see.

Reviews.Title: Backyard spying at night made easy!
Reviews.Author: Molly71299
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a few weeks now and could not be happier with it!It's easy to use with very clear instructions.  For my purposes - enjoying the nightly visitors to my backyard - this has been absolutely perfect!  With nothing to alert the animals that they are "on camera" they behave normally and are not spooked.  I take the SD card out every morning and plug it in my laptop to see the action from the night before but could also use the USB port as well. This was half the price of any models I saw in stores and far simpler to use.  I have used the single picture, multiple picture and video mode and changing modes is simple.The pictures taken in the dark are surprisingly quite clear. The only times I have not gotten the pictures or videos have been purely operator error - not turning it on before closing it!This camera could not be more fun and easier to use and a better value!  Everyone who has seen it now wants one of their own. I had had NO idea of the variety of animals who come to my yard every night to eat under the bird feeder!  AMAZING.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Jason D. Geiger
Reviews.Content: This is just a simple little camera.  I would buy a couple more for a cheap way to keep multiple cameras out there.  I wish I could set the delay lower for picture taking but it's probably the best for the money if you just want a couple photos for proof of animals in the area.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jan Rottler
Reviews.Content: Love it! Great photos, batteries last a long,time. My only wish is that it would tell you how many pictures it took and be able to display  them on the game camera. Love it.

Reviews.Title: compact trail camera
Reviews.Author: loren bergeron
Reviews.Content: I bought this trail camera for bow hunting and thought it was very easy to set up. I have not had time to see the pictures to judge them  or find how long batteries will last

Reviews.Title: Trail Camera
Reviews.Author: David Hinaman
Reviews.Content: A friend had researched the product and bought one earlier.  He recommended this particular product to me.  I am very happy with it, although a clearer picture would be nice, but what I get is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: great outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Big Island Guy
Reviews.Content: this camera was easy to install and operate within minutes out of the box.  I was able to capture great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Neat
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "dwaszak"
Reviews.Content: Works wonderfully, is sturdy and easy to use. It also takes good quality pictures, that are easy to track and print.

Reviews.Title: Great fun!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I  setup this camera and put it out the first night I had it. Setup is easy. The next morning I had great shots of 3 deer in my yard and a couple of other animals. The pics were clear and excellent quality, so far a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Daniel Houska
Reviews.Content: This is what I need to keep an eye on my place when I am not at home, beware tresspassers.

Reviews.Title: Trail Cam
Reviews.Author: Eddie Wells
Reviews.Content: WOW, Takes great pictures and the batteries last for a long time - I was impressed. Will definitely buy some more of these.

Reviews.Title: whitetail trail camera
Reviews.Author: cuz1949
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't bet it.It is very effective and works great.Now when people come in my yard I got their picture then I will take it to sheriff's office and you will be arrested.end of story.Gonna get another one for deer season.

Reviews.Title: camera for game tracking etc..
Reviews.Author: Arnold  Dojan
Reviews.Content: I don't know what else I would  need in a camera.  It was easy to set up except for some reason the card I had to install would not format.  Don't know why.

Reviews.Title: comes without everything you need to work
Reviews.Author: cleveland reviewer
Reviews.Content: i got this camera, but still can not use it, because inside the box you will NOT find essentials!1. NO batteries +10$2. NO memory card+10$3. NO software or even cord/USB to download pictures!when you will get all of this, you will waste a lot of time before you can actually see pics:(Well, the most nasty feature of this camera is Self turn OFF!!! ...UNREALIABLE

Reviews.Title: Got to love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Barbara K. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera continuously since I got it. I have identified problem animals in my barn and love the candid shots of the deer. It is easy to set up and use. I still have a litte problem clearing the pics off the camera, but practice makes perfect.

ProductInfo.Features:
3MP, 5MP or 7MP high quality full color resolution; 640x480 video day or night
Super simple LCD setup screen; date and time stamp on images
Infrared night vision LEDs that are virtually invisible to game; 15 low glow LEDs -- 30 ft. range
Motion-activated PIR sensor has a range of up to 25 feet
6-month battery life; requires 4 AA batteries and a SD card up to 32GB (user supplied)
Made in China
ProductInfo.Name: Simmons Whitetail Trail Camera with Night Vision (4MP)
